B

br.eti.fml.behavior - package br.eti.fml.behavior
Utility package related with classes behavior.
br.eti.fml.machinegun - package br.eti.fml.machinegun
Despite the MachineGun is the main class, you can only obtain a machine gun through an Army.
br.eti.fml.machinegun.auditorship - package br.eti.fml.machinegun.auditorship
This package groups a set of auditing tools, i.e., monitoring tools to make external log and/or speed auditing.
br.eti.fml.machinegun.externaltools - package br.eti.fml.machinegun.externaltools
This package groups a set of external tools, like persisted queues specific implementations.

Factory() - Constructor for class br.eti.fml.behavior.Factory
 
fire(T) - Method in class br.eti.fml.machinegun.MachineGun
You can use a MachineGun to "fire" the data as fast as possible into an internal buffer to, after, be placed in an persisted embedded queue to be processed as soon as possible until finally reach the final associated target.

startANewMission(String, String, Factory<DirtyWork<T>>, Capsule<T>) - Method in class br.eti.fml.machinegun.Army

updateCurrentBufferSize(int, int) - Method in interface br.eti.fml.machinegun.auditorship.ArmyAudit
